title: Chemeng Energy Systems
description: Students will acquire the knowledge and tools to analyze CHP systems, traditional power generation, refinery and biorefinery configurations and advanced power generation and storage options.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CHBE 2130 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and CHBE 2120 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
